title: Collaborative Intelligence in Multiagent Systems With Python
author: Oladimeji Sowole
description: With Python tools like LangChain, implementing multiagent systems is easier, enabling the creation of intelligent systems beyond simple automation.
cntitle: Python 多智能体系统中的协同智能
cndescription: 使用 LangChain 等 Python 工具，可以更轻松地实现多智能体系统，从而创建超越简单自动化的智能系统。
